00024 #ifndef _SPECTRUMLISTWRAPPER_HPP_ 
00025 #define _SPECTRUMLISTWRAPPER_HPP_ 
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "data/msdata/MSData.hpp"
00029 #include <stdexcept>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace analysis {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// Inheritable pass-through implementation for wrapping a SpectrumList 
00037 class PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumListWrapper : public msdata::SpectrumList
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     SpectrumListWrapper(const msdata::SpectrumListPtr& inner)
00042     :   inner_(inner)
00043     {
00044         if (!inner.get()) throw std::runtime_error("[SpectrumListWrapper] Null SpectrumListPtr.");
00045     }
00046 
00047     virtual size_t size() const {return inner_->size();}
00048     virtual bool empty() const {return inner_->empty();}
00049     virtual const msdata::SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity(size_t index) const {return inner_->spectrumIdentity(index);} 
00050     virtual size_t find(const std::string& id) const {return inner_->find(id);}
00051     virtual size_t findNative(const std::string& nativeID) const {return inner_->findNative(nativeID);}
00052     virtual msdata::SpectrumPtr spectrum(size_t index, bool getBinaryData = false) const {return inner_->spectrum(index, getBinaryData);}
00053 
00054     protected:
00055 
00056     msdata::SpectrumListPtr inner_;
00057 };
00058 
00059 
00060 } // namespace analysis 
00061 } // namespace pwiz
00062 
00063 
00064 #endif // _SPECTRUMLISTWRAPPER_HPP_
